title: [Gameplay] Spelling Error In Shop Menu
body:
While playing something like support, the "aggressive" tab that describes the items is both spelled as "agressive" and is also not capitalized, like the rest of the titles!

I'm unsure if this is the correct spot to post this, but its actually driving me crazy! Thanks!

replies.body:
Hiya NarcissistAlex,

Thanks for the report! We're aware of the issue and are working on a fix!
